meanings.definition: To be superior to in strength, skill, or resources.
meanings.sent1: In the race, Sarah was outmatching all the other runners.
meanings.sent2: The champion boxer outmatched his opponent with his powerful punches.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was outmatching the birds in gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The sun outmatches all the stars in brightness.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's strength outmatching the villain's powers was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: To surpass in performance or achievement.
meanings.sent1: The student was outmatching his classmates in the spelling bee.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork outmatched all the others in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The cat was outmatching the dog in catching the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: His determination outmatches any obstacle in his way.
meanings.sent5: The team's spirit outmatching their opponents led them to victory.
